column1:
I've never been given any specific direction to take additional steps outside my authority.
White House press secretary Sarah Sanders wouldn't discuss what authority Rogers was referencing, but said the president was looking at ways to prevent Russian meddling.
Rogers said he doesn't have the day-to-day authority to try to deter Russian activities at their source.
But Rogers said: It certainly hasn't generated the change in behavior that I think we all know we need."hink we all know we need."
